caption:
This photograph depicts a scene of environmental devastation, showing a body of water heavily polluted with various debris. The reflected sunlight on the rippling surface of the water contrasts starkly with the clutter of damaged and submerged objects.

Key elements include:

- Water surface: The expansive water surface dominates the foreground and middle of the photo, its deep blue tone reflecting the sky above.
- Debris: The water is littered with various types of garbage and debris, including numerous rusty and partially submerged car frames, overturned metal structures, and tangled wires.
- Industrial waste: Objects that appear to be remnants of industrial equipment, possibly from nearby factories or workshops, are visible throughout.
- Background: In the distance, beyond the polluted water, a flat landscape can be seen, possibly a wetland or coastal area, with sparse industrial structures visible on the horizon under a clear sky.

Overall, the photograph communicates a powerful message about environmental pollution and the impact of industrial waste on natural landscapes, emphasizing the contrast between the natural beauty of the water and the ugliness of the debris cluttering it.
title: Junked cars, bed springs, pipes and other debris are seen in a five acre pond filled with acid water and oil.  It was cleaned up under epa supervision to prevent possible contamination of Great Salt Lake and a wildlife refuge nearby
